content:
Hey,

this topic can be closed if this is a stupid idea... but im playing around currently with zulip and ldap auth is working awesome. so when same user is logged in windows domain could be auto login if the user open "zulip desktop client"?

Thx!
Erik

It's not at all a stupid idea! I don't think we've done any work that would enable that, though -- IIRC that means that the Zulip server needs to be joined to the domain, which is something that we can't do for Zulip Cloud. It's potentially doable with self-hosted Zulip, but IIRC recalls some finagling to get the server joined to AD. But the last time I tried this was over a decade ago, so it may have gotten better.
